nodes.text: 10 myths about the racial wealth gap\nhttps://t.co/ST95Qklf2R
@axios Just shameful \nThe longer these disparities continue, the harder they will be to fix. Changes, MAJOR changes need to be made and NOW\nNot 2 yrs, or 5 yrs or 20 yrs, NOW.
